    "div" : "<div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>IPSPersonalRelationship</h2><div><p>The Value Set is used (optionally) to code the type of contact relationship between a person and the patient.</p>
</div><p>This value set includes codes from the following code systems:</p><ul><li>Include these codes as defined in <a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html"><code>http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode</code></a><table class="none"><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap"><b>Code</b></td><td><b>Display</b></td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-AUNT">AUNT</a></td><td>aunt</td><td>The player of the role is a sister of the scoping person's mother or father.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-CHILD">CHILD</a></td><td>child</td><td>The player of the role is a child of the scoping entity.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-CHLDADOPT">CHLDADOPT</a></td><td>adopted child</td><td>The player of the role is a child taken into a family through legal means and raised by the scoping person (parent) as his or her own child.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-CHLDFOST">CHLDFOST</a></td><td>foster child</td><td>The player of the role is a child receiving parental care and nurture from the scoping person (parent) but not related to him or her through legal or blood ties.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-CHLDINLAW">CHLDINLAW</a></td><td>child in-law</td><td>The player of the role is the spouse of scoping person's child.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-COUSN">COUSN</a></td><td>cousin</td><td>The player of the role is a relative of the scoping person descended from a common ancestor, such as a 	grandparent, by two or more steps in a diverging line.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-DAU">DAU</a></td><td>natural daughter</td><td>The player of the role is a female offspring of the scoping entity (parent).</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-DAUADOPT">DAUADOPT</a></td><td>adopted daughter</td><td>The player of the role is a female child taken into a family through legal means and raised by the scoping person (parent) as his or her own child.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-DAUC">DAUC</a></td><td>daughter</td><td>Description: The player of the role is a female child (of any type) of scoping entity (parent)</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-DAUFOST">DAUFOST</a></td><td>foster daughter</td><td>The player of the role is a female child receiving parental care and nurture from the scoping person (parent) but not related to him or her through legal or blood ties.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-DAUINLAW">DAUINLAW</a></td><td>daughter in-law</td><td>The player of the role is the wife of scoping person's son.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-DOMPART">DOMPART</a></td><td>domestic partner</td><td>The player of the role cohabits with the scoping person but is not the scoping person's spouse.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-FAMMEMB">FAMMEMB</a></td><td>family member</td><td>A relationship between two people characterizing their &quot;familial&quot; relationship</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-FRND">FRND</a></td><td>unrelated friend</td><td>The player of the role is a person who is known, liked, and trusted by the scoping person.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-FTH">FTH</a></td><td>father</td><td>The player of the role is a male who begets or raises or nurtures the scoping entity (child).</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-FTHINLAW">FTHINLAW</a></td><td>father-in-law</td><td>The player of the role is the father of the scoping person's husband or wife.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-GGRPRN">GGRPRN</a></td><td>great grandparent</td><td>The player of the role is a parent of the scoping person's grandparent.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-GRNDCHILD">GRNDCHILD</a></td><td>grandchild</td><td>The player of the role is a child of the scoping person's son or daughter.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-GRPRN">GRPRN</a></td><td>grandparent</td><td>The player of the role is a parent of the scoping person's mother or father.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-MTH">MTH</a></td><td>mother</td><td>The player of the role is a female who conceives, gives birth to, or raises and nurtures the scoping entity (child).</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-MTHINLAW">MTHINLAW</a></td><td>mother-in-law</td><td>The player of the role is the mother of the scoping person's husband or wife.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-NBOR">NBOR</a></td><td>neighbor</td><td>The player of the role lives near or next to the 	scoping person.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-NCHILD">NCHILD</a></td><td>natural child</td><td>The player of the role is an offspring of the scoping entity as determined by birth.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-NIENEPH">NIENEPH</a></td><td>niece/nephew</td><td>The player of the role is a child of scoping person's brother or sister or of the brother or sister of the 	scoping person's spouse.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-PRN">PRN</a></td><td>parent</td><td>The player of the role is one who begets, gives birth to, or nurtures and raises the scoping entity (child).</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-PRNINLAW">PRNINLAW</a></td><td>parent in-law</td><td>The player of the role is the parent of scoping person's husband or wife.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-ROOM">ROOM</a></td><td>roomate</td><td>One who shares living quarters with the subject.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-SIB">SIB</a></td><td>sibling</td><td>The player of the role shares one or both parents in common with the scoping entity.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-SIGOTHR">SIGOTHR</a></td><td>significant other</td><td>A person who is important to one's well being; especially a spouse or one in a similar relationship.  (The player is the one who is important)</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-SON">SON</a></td><td>natural son</td><td>The player of the role is a male offspring of the scoping entity (parent).</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-SONADOPT">SONADOPT</a></td><td>adopted son</td><td>The player of the role is a male child taken into a family through legal means and raised by the scoping person (parent) as his or her own child.</td></tr><tr><td><a (parent)</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-SONFOST">SONFOST</a></td><td>foster son</td><td>The player of the role is a male child receiving parental care and nurture from the scoping person (parent) but not related to him or her through legal or blood ties.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-SONINLAW">SONINLAW</a></td><td>son in-law</td><td>The player of the role is the husband of scoping person's daughter.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-SPS">SPS</a></td><td>spouse</td><td>The player of the role is a marriage partner of the scoping person.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-STPCHLD">STPCHLD</a></td><td>step child</td><td>The player of the role is a child of the scoping person's spouse by a previous union.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-STPDAU">STPDAU</a></td><td>stepdaughter</td><td>The player of the role is a daughter of the scoping person's spouse by a previous union.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-STPSON">STPSON</a></td><td>stepson</td><td>The player of the role is a son of the scoping person's spouse by a previous union.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/RoleCode/cs.html#v3-RoleCode-UNCLE">UNCLE</a></td><td>uncle</td><td>The player of the role is a brother of the scoping person's mother or father.</td></tr></table></li></ul></div>"
